TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi PrintSystemJobInfo extends System.Printing.PrintSystemObject

summary.span: 详细定义打印作业。

span.span: Defines a print job in detail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类具有没有公共构造函数。This class has no public constructor. 要获取对引用对象，请使用静态方法或以下项之一实例方法： ， ，或。To get a reference to a object, use the static method or one of the following instance methods: , , or . 多个打印作业属性，如作业是否完成，必须传递到打印机从对象，然后你的应用程序读取对应的属性 ()。Many print job properties, such as whether a job is completed, must be passed from the printer to the object before your application reads the corresponding property (). 方法提供此功能。The method provides this functionality. 同样，当应用程序发生的值更改时才属性，必须将更改写入打印队列实用程序在计算机上。Similarly, when your application changes the value of the property, the change must be written to the print queue utility on the computer. 方法提供此功能。The method provides this functionality. 如果派生的类从具有其他可写属性，则必须实现的重写和方法。If you derive a class from that has additional writable properties, then you must implement an override of the and methods. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

summary.span: 取消打印作业。

span.span: Cancels the print job.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

summary.span: 将 对象属性的任何更改写入该对象所代表的实际打印作业中。

span.span: Writes any changes to the properties of the object to the actual print job that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅属性为可写。Only the property is writable. 如果派生的类从具有其他可写属性，必须重写和使用你自己的实现的方法。If you derive a class from that has additional writable properties, you must override the and methods with implementations of your own.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDeleted As Boolean
public: property bool IsDeleted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示打印作业（由 对象表示）是否已从打印队列中删除。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the print job, which is represented by the object, was deleted from the print queue.

value.span: 如果已删除打印作业，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the print job was deleted; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 似乎很矛盾在第一个对象可以报告其自身的状态为已删除，但将保留在记住，对象仅*表示*实际的打印作业。It may seem paradoxical at first that an object can report its own status as deleted, but keep in mind that the object only *represents* a real print job. 从其打印队列中删除打印并不会不自动释放的应用程序中的对象。Deleting the latter from its print queue does not automatically dispose of the object in your application. 同样，该对象不会从任何创建之前它所代表的打印作业已被删除。Similarly, the object is not removed from any that was created before the print job it represents was deleted. 例如，如果方法运行之前已删除打印作业，则返回的集合将包括表示打印作业的对象。For example, if the method is run before the print job was deleted, the returned collection will include a object that represents the print job. 删除打印作业时，此对象未从集合中移除。This object is not removed from the collection when the print job is deleted. 但是，如果然后再次运行，返回集合将有表示已删除的打印作业没有成员。But if is then run again, the returned collection will have no members that represent the deleted print jobs. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在诊断问题打印作业时使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property when diagnosing a problem with a print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobProperties](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#spottroubleusingjobproperties)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#spottroubleusingjobproperties)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#spottroubleusingjobproperties)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示打印作业是否已重新启动。

span.span: if the printer is printing; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新启动作业后，它将打印整个作业。When a job is restarted, it prints in its entirety. 重新启动与使用的对比度方法，后者将恢复已暂停的点处的作业。Contrast restarting with using the method, which resumes a job at the point it was paused.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打印队列会保留打印的作业，如果属性对象设置为`true`和如果队列的属性已通过方法。A print queue retains printed jobs if the property of the object is set to `true` and if the properties of the queue have been committed with the method of the .

value.span: 一个标识打印作业的 。

span.span: An that identifies the print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用哪些编号的系统已确定的打印服务器，并且打印服务器是打印服务器设备或计算机操作系统。Which numbering system is used is determined by the operating system of the print server and whether the print server is a computer or a print server appliance. 例如，对于 Microsoft Windows XP 操作系统确定的编号以这种方式： 启用打印服务器后，如果所有打印队列为空，第一个提交打印作业在服务器上的任何用户的任何队列被分配 ID 号 2。For example, the operating system for Microsoft Windows XP determines the numbering in this way: when a print server is turned on, if all its print queues are empty, the first print job submitted on the server by any user and to any queue is assigned ID number 2. 在服务器上的每个后续作业分配一个数字大于该服务器上以前的打印作业。Each subsequent job on the server is assigned a number that is one greater than the previous print job on that server. 打印作业的打印队列对它的数字无效： 如果作业发送到队列 a，队列 b，而队列 a，按此顺序，队列 a 将拥有作业 2 和 4，然后队列 b 将拥有作业 3。The print queue for the print job has no effect on its number: if jobs are sent to QueueA, QueueB, and QueueA, in that order, then QueueA has jobs 2 and 4, and QueueB has job 3. 作业分配大量之后，数量永远不会更改，即使其他作业完成打印或被取消，或者重新启动服务器。After a job is assigned a number, the number never changes, even if other jobs finish printing or are canceled, or if the server is restarted. 如果已作业队列中有一个或多个服务器重新启动时，第一个新的作业分配一个数字大于最大作业编号，该服务器启动时在队列中。If there are already jobs in one or more queues when the server is restarted, the first new job is assigned a number that is one greater than the highest numbered job that was in the queue when the server started. 但是，直到它重新启动时，打印服务器不会重用某个号码。However, until it restarts, a print server does not reuse a number. 即使它在打印之前，最高的编号的作业都会被取消，则下一步作业将获取更高版本是一个数字。Even if the highest numbered job is canceled before it is printed, the next job gets a number that is one higher. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在诊断问题打印作业时使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property when diagnosing a problem with a print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#EnumerateJobsInQueues](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#enumeratejobsinqueues)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#EnumerateJobsInQueues](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#enumeratejobsinqueues)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#EnumerateJobsInQueues](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#enumeratejobsinqueues)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 Windows 8 和更高版本的操作系统上的.NET Framework 4.5 开始，写入到此流的数据必须采用 XPS 格式作为包流。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5 on Windows 8 and later versions of the operating system, data written to this stream must be in XPS format as a package stream.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NumberOfPages As Integer
public: property int NumberOfPages { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取打印作业中的页数。

span.span: Gets the number of pages in the print job.

value.span: 一个 ，它指示打印作业的页数。

span.span: An that states the number of pages in the print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个页是一张纸或其他打印介质的一侧。A page is one side of a sheet of paper or other print media. 下表显示了此属性和使用，表数的值如何受打印作业是否调用双面打印 （双工），它是否为多个页每版，调用或是否同时调用。The following table shows how the value of this property, and the number of sheets used, is affected by whether the print job calls for two-sided printing (duplexing), whether it calls for multiple pages-per-sheet, or whether it calls for both. ### 双工和多页打印如何影响打印How duplexing and multipage printing affect printing |双工Duplexing|每个表的页Pages per sheet|页数的值Value of NumberOfPages|物理张纸的数Number of physical sheets of paper| |---------------|---------------------|----------------------------|----------------------------------------| |否No|11|与在文档中的页面数相同。Identical to the number of pages in the document.|与在文档中的页面数相同。Identical to the number of pages in the document.| |是Yes|11|与在文档中的页面数相同。Identical to the number of pages in the document.|文档页 ÷ 2 （向上舍入）。Document pages ÷ 2 (rounded up).| |否No|多种Multiple|文档页面 ÷ 页，每个表 （向上舍入）。Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet (rounded up).|文档页面 ÷ 页，每个表 （向上舍入）。Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet (rounded up).| |是Yes|多种Multiple|文档页面 ÷ 页，每个表 （向上舍入）。Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet (rounded up).|[文档页每个表的 ÷ 页] ÷ 2 （向上舍入）。[Document pages ÷ Pages per sheet] ÷ 2 (rounded up).|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NumberOfPagesPrinted As Integer
public: property int NumberOfPagesPrinted { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of pages that have already printed.

value.span: 一个 ，它指示已打印的页数。

span.span: An that states the number of pages that have already printed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pause() cil managed

summary.span: 暂停打印作业，直到 运行。

span.span: Halts printing of the job until runs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果队列中有另一个作业，它将开始打印时当前作业已暂停。If another job is in the queue, it begins printing when the current job is paused. 承载还有和方法。The hosting also has and methods. 如果打印队列处于暂停状态，因此继续单个作业不会导致继续打印该作业。If the print queue is paused, resuming an individual job does not cause that job to resume printing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PositionInPrintQueue As Integer
public: property int PositionInPrintQueue { int get(); };

value.span: 一个 ，它指示打印作业在打印队列中的位置。

span.span: An that states the print job's place in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Priority As PrintJobPriority
public: property System::Printing::PrintJobPriority Priority { System::Printing::PrintJobPriority get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个非数字表达式，该表达式表示打印作业相对于打印队列中其他作业的优先级。

span.span: Gets a non-numerical expression that represents the priority of the print job relative to other jobs in the print queue.

value.span: 一个 ，表示打印作业的优先级，如 、、 或 。

span.span: A that represents the priority of the print job as , , , or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 更新 对象的属性，以便它们的值与该对象所代表的实际打印作业的值相匹配。

span.span: Updates the properties of the object so that their values match the values of the actual print job that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性所做的任何更改对象必须通过使用写入到实际的打印作业方法。Any changes that you make to the properties of a object must be written to the actual print job by using the method. 任何未提交的更改会丢失时方法运行。Any changes that you have not committed are lost when the method runs. 如果派生的类从具有其他属性，则必须重写提供你自己的实现的方法。If you derive a class from that has additional properties, then you must override the method with an implementation of your own.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Restart() cil managed

summary.span: 从头开始重新启动打印作业。

span.span: Restarts a print job from the beginning.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或者，你可以使用方法，后者将重新启动已暂停的打印作业，从已暂停的点开始。Optionally, you can use the method, which restarts a paused print job, starting at the point it was paused.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Resume() cil managed

summary.span: 继续打印暂停的打印作业。

span.span: Resumes the printing of a paused print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 承载还有和方法。The hosting also has and methods. 如果打印队列已暂停，则继续单个作业不会继续打印作业的打印。If the print queue is paused, resuming an individual job does not resume the printing of the print job. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法恢复暂停的打印作业。The following example shows how to use this method to resume a paused print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#HandlePausedJob](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#handlepausedjob)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#HandlePausedJob](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#handlepausedjob)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#HandlePausedJob](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#handlepausedjob)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StartTimeOfDay As Integer
public: property int StartTimeOfDay { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一天中打印作业可以开始打印的最早时间，用协调世界时 (UTC)（也称为格林尼治标准时间 [GMT]）午夜过后的分钟数表示。

span.span: Gets the earliest time of day, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) (also called Greenwich Mean Time [GMT]), that the print job can begin printing.

value.span: 一个 ，指定打印作业可能的最早开始时间，用 (UTC) 午夜过后的分钟数表示。

span.span: An specifying the earliest possible start time for the print job, expressed as the number of minutes after midnight (UTC).

value.span: 最大值为 1439。

span.span: The maximum value is 1439.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值传播到每个对象属性承载时作业将进入队列。This value is propagated to each object from the property of the hosting at the time the job enters the queue. 如果发生更改，那么任何值早于更改的值为。If is changed, then any value that is earlier than is changed to the value of . 将作业添加到队列后，它可以提供一个新值通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，前提是不早于。After the job is added to the queue, it can be given a new value through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], provided that it is not earlier than . 如果你不在 UTC 时区中，你必须添加或减去 60 以获得正确的时间为你所在的时区的倍数。If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to get the correct time for your time zone. 例如，如果您处于北美太平洋时区内和夏时制不起作用，则您的本地时间为 8 小时早于 UTC。For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC. 如果返回 960，它表示 16:00 （下午 4:00） utc 格式的 (因为 960/60 = 16)。If returns 960, that means 16:00 (4:00 PM) in UTC (because 960/60 = 16). 若要将其转换为太平洋时间，您必须减去 （= 8 \* 60） 的 480 分钟。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 (= 8 \* 60) minutes. 此外必须记住，时间为零为 24 小时后滚动 (即; 1439 分钟后)。You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after 24 hours (that is; after the 1439th minute). 如果返回 120，意味着凌晨 2:00 utc 格式的。If returns 120, that means 2:00 AM in UTC. 若要将其转换为太平洋时间，必须减去 480 分钟，这将导致-360。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 minutes, which results in -360. 若要获取有意义的正值，请将负的数字添加到一天，1440，从而导致 1080 （下午 6:00） 太平洋时间一个最终值中的总分钟数。To get a positive value that has meaning, add the negative number to the total minutes in a day, 1440, resulting in a final value of 1080 (6:00 PM) Pacific Time. 请参阅， ，和帮助进行时区调整的方法。See , , and for methods that help make time-zone adjustments. 如果打印机始终可用，此属性对所有的时区中返回 0。If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将此属性用作诊断问题的打印作业的过程的一部分。The following example shows how to use this property as part of the process of diagnosing a problematic print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)]

value.span: 最大值为 1439。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值传播到每个对象属性承载时作业将进入队列。This value is propagated to each object from the property of the hosting at the time the job enters the queue. 如果发生更改，那么任何该值晚于更改的值为。If is changed, then any value that is later than is changed to the value of . 将作业添加到队列后，它可以提供一个新值通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，前提是不晚于。After the job is added to the queue, it can be given a new value through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], provided that it is not later than . 如果你不在 UTC 时区中，你必须添加或减去 60 以获得正确的时间为你所在的时区的倍数。If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to get the correct time for your time zone. 例如，如果您处于北美太平洋时区内和夏时制不起作用，则您的本地时间为 8 小时早于 UTC。For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC. 如果返回 960，它表示 16:00 （下午 4:00） utc 格式的 (因为 960/60 = 16)。If returns 960, that means 16:00 (4:00 PM) in UTC (because 960/60 = 16). 若要将其转换为太平洋时间，您必须减去 （= 8 \* 60） 的 480 分钟。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 (= 8 \* 60) minutes. 此外必须记住，时间为零为 24 小时后滚动 (即; 1439 分钟后)。You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after 24 hours (that is; after the 1439th minute). 如果返回 120，意味着凌晨 2:00 utc 格式的。If returns 120, that means 2:00 AM in UTC. 若要将其转换为太平洋时间，必须减去 480 分钟，这将导致-360。To convert this to Pacific Time, you must subtract 480 minutes, which results in -360. 若要获取有意义的正值，请将负的数字添加到一天，1440，从而导致 1080 （下午 6:00） 太平洋时间一个最终值中的总分钟数。To get a positive value that has meaning, add the negative number to the total minutes in a day, 1440, resulting in a final value of 1080 (6:00 PM) Pacific Time. 请参阅， ，和帮助进行时区调整的方法。See , , and for methods that help make time-zone adjustments. 如果打印机始终可用，此属性对所有的时区中返回 0。If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将此属性用作诊断问题的打印作业的过程的一部分。The following example shows how to use this property as part of the process of diagnosing a problematic print job. [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CPP/Program.cpp#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-csharp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/CSharp/Program.cs#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#UsingJobStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/visualbasic/program.vb#usingjobstartanduntiltimes)]
